name: Pottery Maker
description:
COMPLETE POTTERY CYCLE
- choose the design of your future handicraft
- mould it with a potter’s wheel
- put it in an oven to fire and then paint it as you wish

HANDY CREATIVITY TRAINING
- create unique pottery design
- use various colours, patterns and decorations
- save your masterpiece and show to the friends

EXCITING HANDICRAFT EXPERIENCE
- try out the new fascinating hobby
- find balance between handicraft and nature
- create perfection in the ceramic vase
